lead_paragraph: Jeremy Mayfield will not return to Bill Davis Racing next season, the team said. Mayfield joined the team this year when it expanded to two cars, but he has struggled to qualify for races, making 8 of 21 events. His No. 36 Camry team was new for 2007 and did not have a guaranteed starting spot in the first five races of the season because it was outside the top 35 in owner points. After failing to qualify for the first four races of the year, Mayfield has not reached the top 35.
